instinct_candidates.title: Tile generation uses shell script
instinct_candidates.trigger: When working with the az-hp map tile pipeline or modifying geographic data processing
instinct_candidates.action: Check pipeline/04_generate_tiles.sh for tile generation logic. The pipeline follows a numbered sequence: 03_enrich.py -> 04_generate_tiles.sh.

instinct_candidates.title: Frontend uses JSX with React
instinct_candidates.trigger: When editing the az-hp frontend UI
instinct_candidates.action: The frontend entry point is frontend/src/App.jsx. Use React/JSX conventions when modifying components.
